.badge-primary, .bg-primary { background-color: var(--primary) !important; } .badge-secondary, .bg-secondary { background-color: var(--secondary) !important; } .badge-success, .bg-success { background-color: var(--success) !important; } .badge-info, .bg-info { background-color: var(--info) !important; } .badge-warning, .bg-warning { background-color: var(--warning) !important; } !important; }
.btn-primary:not(:disabled):not(.disabled):active, .btn-primary:not(:disabled):not(.disabled).active, .show > .btn-primary.dropdown-toggle, .btn-primary, .btn-primary:hover { background-color: var(--primary); border-color: var(--primary); }
